value.title: Introducing New Shapes with Customize shape formatting

Now, we can apply shape formatting in a dynamic manner in Power BI. To apply, shape formatting, we need to apply conditional formatting like other Power BI visuals.

value.title: PowerQuery Tips ‚Äì Split Multiple Columns to Rows at Once

At that time we need to use function Text.Split() and Table.FromColumn()
